Title: A Digital Ecosystem for Digital Competences: The CRISS Project Demo
Abstract: © 2018, Springer Nature Switzerland AG.CRISS is a flexible and scalable cloud-based digital learning ecosystem that has the potential to allow the guided acquisition, evaluation and certification of digital competences. This demonstration will highlight some of the key activities under development, their underlying pedagogy and how the platform’s features support the acquisition, assessment and certification of digital competences.
